event.description: Denard Span grounds out, third baseman Melvin Mora to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Matt Tolbert flies out to left fielder Felix Pie.
Brendan Harris pops out to shortstop Cesar Izturis.
Justin Morneau flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Michael Cuddyer flies out to center fielder Adam Jones.
Delmon Young strikes out on a foul tip.
Carlos Gomez called out on strikes.
Mike Redmond singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones.
Nick Punto lines out to right fielder Nick Markakis.
Denard Span bunt grounds out, pitcher Mark Hendrickson to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Pitching Change: Brian Bass replaces Mark Hendrickson.
Matt Tolbert strikes out swinging.
Brendan Harris walks.
Justin Morneau strikes out swinging.
Michael Cuddyer strikes out swinging.
Delmon Young singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Nick Markakis.
Carlos Gomez singles on a ground ball to pitcher Brian Bass. Delmon Young to 2nd.
Mike Redmond singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Delmon Young to 3rd. Carlos Gomez to 2nd.
Nick Punto grounds into a force out, second baseman Brian Roberts to shortstop Cesar Izturis. Delmon Young scores. Carlos Gomez to 3rd. Mike Redmond out at 2nd. Nick Punto to 1st.
With Denard Span batting, Carlos Gomez caught stealing home, pitcher Brian Bass to first baseman Aubrey Huff to shortstop Cesar Izturis to catcher Gregg Zaun.
Denard Span grounds out, pitcher Brian Bass to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Matt Tolbert grounds out, second baseman Brian Roberts to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Brendan Harris called out on strikes.
Justin Morneau singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brian Roberts, deflected by pitcher Brian Bass.
Brian Roberts grounds out, second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Adam Jones doubles (10) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Denard Span.
Nick Markakis homers (5) on a fly ball to right field. Adam Jones scores.
Aubrey Huff doubles (8) on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Melvin Mora grounds out softly, third baseman Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Luke Scott singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Aubrey Huff scores.
Gregg Zaun grounds into a force out, second baseman Matt Tolbert to shortstop Nick Punto. Luke Scott out at 2nd.
Felix Pie called out on strikes.
Cesar Izturis doubles (4) on a fly ball to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Brian Roberts flies out to left fielder Denard Span.
Adam Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Denard Span. Cesar Izturis out at home on the throw, left fielder Denard Span to catcher Mike Redmond.
Nick Markakis lines out to left fielder Denard Span.
Aubrey Huff flies out to left fielder Denard Span.
Melvin Mora strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Craig Breslow replaces Kevin Slowey.
Luke Scott homers (5) on a fly ball to center field.
Gregg Zaun flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Felix Pie bunt pops out to third baseman Brendan Harris.
Cesar Izturis pops out to shortstop Nick Punto in foul territory.
Brian Roberts flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Adam Jones grounds out, third baseman Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Nick Markakis singles on a ground ball to left fielder Denard Span.
Aubrey Huff flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
